previous.excerpt: This is an on demand financial services marketplace. You can immediately connect with Finance, Accounting and Investing professionals. If you are a finance/accounting professional, you can connect with clients easily. Product Link: Doughflowclub.com

next.excerpt: genei is an AI-powered productivity tool that now enables users to automatically summarise webpages or PDFs as they browse.
next.title: genei chrome extension - AI-generated summaries of webpages and PDFs as you browse 🚀

localize.description: genei是一款由人工智能驱动的生产力工具，现在用户可以在浏览网页或PDF时自动进行总结。
localize.tagline: 当您浏览🚀时，AI生成网页和PDF的摘要。
